/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, trees can be seen lining the street, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees contrasting with the more muted tones of the buildings.
